alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Liberty; Polk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 7:44PM CST until February 01 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Menard Creek near Rye affecting Hardin, Liberty and Polk Counties. For the Menard Creek...including Rye...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Menard Creek near Rye. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Moderate lowland flooding begins as low lying areas along the creek are inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 22.4 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.4 feet on 06/09/1981. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Menard Creek Rye 20.0 19.0 Sun 7 pm CST 23.9 20.7 17.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 745 AM CST.
